channel.title: Projects on Paras Gandhi
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Paras Gandhi

item.title: Bytenet VQA
item.description: About project We propose a method for visual question answering which combines a CNN with Bytenet to form a fully connected convolutional neural network. The use of Bytenet over RNN gives speed improvement over training and validation. Parallel processing of the the network results in run time that is linear in the length of the sequence. Will make it public pretty soon…
